key.name: automount-manager
key.description: If set to true, then Budgie Helper application will be used to automount removable media.

key.name: bluetooth-applet
key.description: If set to true, then Budgie Helper application will be used to show a Bluetooth applet.

key.name: desktop-background
key.description: If set to true, then Budgie Helper application will be used to draw the desktop background.

key.name: workarounds
key.description: If set to true, then Budgie Helper application will use workarounds to fix bugs.

key.name: fade
key.description: If set to true, then fade effect will be used to change the desktop background.

key.name: fix-app-menu
key.description: If set to true, then budgie-helper will force Gtk/ShellShowsAppMenu to FALSE. Disable if you want to use gnome-settings-daemon overrides in xsettings plugin for 'Gtk/ShellShowsAppMenu' property.

key.name: fix-button-layout
key.description: If set to non-empty string, then budgie-helper will force Gtk/DecorationLayout to value set by this setting. Set to empty string if you want to use gnome-settings-daemon overrides in xsettings plugin for 'Gtk/DecorationLayout' property.
